website_summaries.verdict: Self-dispensing rack takes all the work out of organizing your pantry.
pros: Intuitive top-loading design dispenses one can at a time
Ideal for soda cans or pet food cans
Comes with 2 racks that are stackable
Design allows you to organize cans in order of expiration date for less waste
Clear instructions ensure quick and easy assembly
cons: May be too large to store in the fridge, best suited for pantry

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I was getting tired of having to transfer more Diet Coke from my pantry to my fridge every day. This organizes the cans very well, and I can store way more than I could in the door, which is what I was doing before. Be warned though, they are pretty large. Larger than I had thought, I measured before buying, and I thought I could store them on the bottom shelf, but when I assembled them and tried, I had to move the middle shelf up another level before they would fit.
customer_reviews.author: rbittman

customer_reviews.title: I can find what I have
customer_reviews.text: This unit is just right. It's smaller than some of the others and fits in my tight spot.
customer_reviews.author: BookBroke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing canned goods
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to organize some canned soups in my pantry. They sit perfectly on the wire shelving that I have. My basic canned soups (cream of chicken, tomato etc) fit perfectly. The only con is the angle is not dramatic enough, so gravity is not quite enough to get the cans to fall forward when one is removed. I would rather these be 1” taller with a more dramatic angle. However, a simple tap and the cans roll forward. These are much better than cheaper versions I’ve tried and I ended up buying a second set.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Soda Storage
customer_reviews.text: These are larger than I thought they would be. I was going to rate these as 4 stars. But that isn’t far because if I had read the dimensions I would have known that they would not fit in my shelf. Originally I was disappointed because they take up more space than a box of soda. But I have decided a really like these and I might order another set. They are good quality and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! A lot better than the other wire ones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the another brand and returned them for multiple reasons. THESE ARE FANTASTIC and less expensive too! I stacked three sets side by side in a bottom cabinet and now I have storage for six dozen cans of soda. I dont have to get down on my hands and knees to reach th last one too! They stack well and hold together and, even though they don’t really need it, I zip tied mine together using the zip ties that they used to ship them with. The cans roll very well and don’t get hung up. At this price I may buy some for my soups too!
customer_reviews.author: Clint Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Works with Coke cans and most can foods. Easy assembly and stackable. My first order had a warped piece that interfered with the functionality but when I contacted the sellers they immediately replaced the unit at no charge. Good product. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, this is a really good can rack. I use it for my dog's canned food. Usually the cans roll down like they are supposed to, although when first loading it when it was empty, the cans had a tendency to turn and not go down correctly, but now that it's full, it seems to always work correctly. I love that they are stackable, it saves so much room as opposed to the ones that only go side by side. Super easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: good solution for product rotation and dispensing
customer_reviews.text: Been using this set for standard 13.5, 13.66, 15 ounce cans & short 12 ounce canned goods such as coconut milk, pumpkin puree, etc... vs. soda cans. Of these sizes holds 10 cans; an 11th can will fit but slightly over the front guard on top rack. So much easier to add new product to top rack to dispense out vs. pulling product off the shelf when getting low to put newer cans behind to keep rotated. On occasion a can will get wonky rolling from top rack to bottom but a quick jiggle usually resolves. These are installed on a pantry shelf side-by-side, have not stacked units to review that functionality.
customer_reviews.author: jem

customer_reviews.title: Okay for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest, generally works okay. Sometimes cans get hung up in the back where it transitions from top rack to lower level-probably my fault by pushing a newly loaded warm can in a ways because it was not loaded perfectly square with the upper rolling feature frame. No problems with assembly, made correct in the first place, some reviewers noted theirs were not so. No can punchers or cans popping out of the front when loading either. Just put one unit in the fridge, the other in the pantry. Nice to have but overpriced for what they are. Properly engineered plastic material & design equivalent could be made/sold/shipped for much less and improve shortcomings noted herein and by others.
customer_reviews.author: P Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Item was easy to assemble (pay attention to which side pieces go where because it does matter) and doesn't feel "cheap" at all. The dark color is very sophisticated and I would be happy displaying these on my counter if I had room. Right now they are side by side in my fridge holding cans of soda, but I plan to buy several more to organize soup cans, etc. in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: i love the assembly process
customer_reviews.text: i love the assembly process!!! they assemble with just putting the pegs in a hole- BUT THE GREAT PART IS- the pins & holes are different sizes which makes it easy to go together correctly!!!!!!!! they are held together by gravity- so when rearranging them always grab the bottom- EVEN if full of cans! the size is great and allows easy to fit in many different pantries or cabinets! the stacking option is also great with a channel that prevents the top unit from sliding off- i would also add a tie-wrap for extra safety-
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE D.

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 4 stars if...
customer_reviews.text: they hadn't sent me a package already-opened by a previous customer who returned it, including cut-up pieces of nylon wire-ties which were used in the original packaging, an instruction sheet with a large section simply ripped out of it, and other bits of packaging trash. Moreover, the first purchaser kept the hardware packet of mounting screws. The seller decided to recoup their losses by sending the mess to me, sans mounting screw packet, therefore I do not recommend this seller. The bins themselves are flimsy but easy to assemble, and work perfectly. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of five and have get together often, so we always have soda on hand. It is annoying having cases sitting around and we just remodeled our kitchen but I didn’t think of how to store soda. Anyway, this fit perfectly a cabinet next to the fridge. My kids don’t complain when they have to put the soda a ay after shopping because it is kinda fun putting them in. Also since I was able to use a cabinet next to the fridge (genius if I say so myself), there are always cold sodas available.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: A good solution for storing soups.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for soups, especially for the "sipping cup" type of soup can. It frees up room in my larger can organizer, where this type of can doesn,t work very well. FTR, any small soup can works, as do 14.5 oz. Cans, though 6 oz cans work better in the larger organizer! Very stackable. It's easy to reach in from the side to get the desired variety of soup, (or soda) , just leave some vacant space (on the side) for your hand to do so. Makes a lovely rainy day toy for kids; they like to watch the cans on top drop down & roll down the chute. OK, so do I. Simple pleasures.
customer_reviews.author: Paulajeanne

customer_reviews.title: Okay but better alternatives out there
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I had to assemble them or I wouldn't have ordered because they don't snap together and when you try to move them they come apart. They are also much taller than I expected and I had to lower the shelves they are sitting on which made other shelves thinner. I'll keep them because I've installed them and they do what they are supposed to do but I wouldn't order them again. I would recommend finding ones that are one piece instead of having to be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kazoo 62

customer_reviews.title: AVOID — Nothing is labeled an edges are sharp puncturing cans
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is labeled. Telling you in the instructions that one side is “A” or “B” means little with poorly drawn pictures. Could it have cost that much more to have labeled the pieces? Second, there are very sharp edges. So much so that two cans rolling in were punctured and began spraying soda all over everything. I could not hate this more. I should not have to see where the sharp edges are and sand them. Completely worthless and avoid this at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: V. Amador

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together and organize with!!
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers were so easy to put together. I did it in a couple minutes after I received the package. They stack so easy, and fit most of the cans I had. I absolutely LOVE how organized it made a section of my pantry and how itmakes it easier to make sure I use the oldest first. I will get more with each paycheck and do my WHOLE canned pantry. I have to look through for diffent sizes the make sure every can in said pantry is organized and helpful in the First in, first out system I want to continue for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Morgan Olivia Adelaide Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Handy, heavy duty for the price - I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, heavy duty, stackable and should last us for a LONG time. We used to put three, 24 packs of pop on a single shelf of our side-by-side fredg/freezer. This fredg/freezer is the garage fredg that we load up with beer, pop, extra milk and other foods. We had to raise the shelf one notch and can now fit two dispensers on the shelf with a little extra room on the side of the shelf. Now we buy cheaper 36 packs and simply add beer/pop when the dispenser is getting low. We bought six dispensers, use four and gave our children the others.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Makes my Fridge Prettier
customer_reviews.text: Just adding these racks makes my fridge interior LOOK better, more organized, and it's easier to see things on the shelf they're on. I hope to get other sorts of fridge organizers because we couldn't be happier with them. They were a little tough to put together at first. The instructions don't have words, and my eyes aren't what they used to be, but we got them both assembled and installed in the fridge in less than 15 minutes, even with me screwing it all up at first. Definitely recommended. Plus, for some reason, now we aren't drinking as much soda.
customer_reviews.author: Bellina

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice, but not transportable
customer_reviews.text: These can holders are really nice and well built. The downside, is the transportability. The sides and slides will come apart if you try to lift or carry them for one location to another. To solve this, I used sealant glue and super glue to hold the pieces together. Would I recommend these? Yes, just as long as they stay in one location. If you do need to move them from one place to another as I do, then you should glue them together.
customer_reviews.author: robertjonessan

customer_reviews.title: I'M ONE HAPPY SHOPPER!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase! I have a small gaming cafe where we give free beverages to our guests. It was always a struggle to get the cans out of cases, constantly tugging and shuffelng them. Life is sooo much easier now! I ordered one set to make sure they would do what we wanted. I very quickly ordered 4 more sets when I found them to be a sturdy product that worked well. This is also the best price I could find. LOVE 'EM!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Before we got it we were always tripping over half empty and empty soda boxes. Now we recycle the boxes immediately so there's no fuss. Also no more guessing how many beverages of each kind are left. Before buying I read reviews stating not to stack both units one on top of the other do to tipping. This is not the case unless its deliberately/accidentally knocked over or the bottom racks are empty which will make it top heavy. To counter this I put less popular drinks on the bottom racks and more popular drinks on the top. I also have it set up in a corner that's just out of the main walking paths.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Watch for sharp points
customer_reviews.text: Overall simple and effective design. However, the first time I loaded it I had a leaking can. In checking the rails I found weld splatter that had a point to it on the top of one of the rails. I filed it down and no more punctured cans.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are metal & not cheap plastic even though one of the thin side wires was broken off the main frame. They were bigger than I thought they would be. Took up the whole shelf in my side by side fridge when I put them next to each other but that was a minor inconvenience. They came with rubber feet which was nice & plastic clips to keep them together when stacked. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy apparatus and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly and surprisingly sturdy apparatus. Sure beats the cardboard boxes that stick to the glass shelves in our spare refrigerator. I also like that I can put two types of cold beverages on the same rack. You can see them and reach for the top shelf item or the bottom shelf item. I will likely buy another set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Preddy

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver !
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is not purchasing this earlier. My husband has a serious diet coke habit and his drinks used to take up nearly the first shelf of our fridge. While we cannot stack the two racks vertically due to the height of our shelves, it frees up quite a bit of shelf space and there are always cold diet cokes ready to go. This set was on the lower range in terms of price but I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality. I can't wait to get a fridge large enough where we can stack the racks vertically!
customer_reviews.author: Viet T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great Service at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was quick. I don't recall the time but faster than anticipated. East to put together but I was missing the footings and connectors but I was still able to use. My wife and her diet coke was happy...delighted! I contacted the seller about the missing parts. They responded within hours and the parts arrived within 2 days. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Hertzfeld

customer_reviews.title: SODA CAN HOLDERS
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE PERFECT TO HOLD A FULL 12 PACK OF SODAS,ACTUALLY 2 12 PACKS BECAUSE THE SET COMES WITH 2 HOLDERS .IT FITS IN MY FRIDGE PERFECTLY AND DOESN'T TAKE UP ALOT OF SPACE EITHER.WHEN YOU TAKE 1 SODA OUT FROM BOTTEM,THE NEXT JUST ROLLS FORWARD SO AWESOME.I HAD SOME FLIMSY PLASTIC SODA HOLDERS BUT SODAS WERE ALWAYS GETTING STUCK IN THE BACK.THESE LOOK AMAZING AND WORK WELL,I GOT THE SET IN THE BRONZE COLOR,AND I'M VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE,THANKS AMAZON!!
customer_reviews.author: ZEBRA LADY

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design, don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our house and I was going to put this in the new refrigerator. I"m past the window to return this, but I won't even donate this it is so bad. I hope that Amazon will reconsider and allow me to return this product and they should not sell it to their customers - it is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: One fits perfectly in the bottom shelf of my refrigerator. And they make it a lot easier to see how low we're running on soda. They do seem a bit like the shelf pieces will fall out of the side pieces if lifted when empty but the weight of the cans helps settle them solidly in the sockets. My initial order had one come with two right hand side pieces but the seller immediately sent a replacement when I contacted them about this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miura

customer_reviews.title: Good to poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these units. The first ones were very good so I purchased more. Second order the units were poorly fabricated, they were difficult to assemble, and were crooked after assembling. I tried to rebend these the best I could. Don't understand why the first ones were so good and the second so poor.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, works great for canned goods
customer_reviews.text: I have had one set of these for over a year and it’s still in perfect condition. I love how organized my canned goods are, I got four more to add more organization to my cabinet! I use it for regular sized cans, it’s extremely sturdy and perfect for dispensing cans so you use the oldest product first, and can restock whenever without worrying about burying older cans!!!! First in first out!
customer_reviews.author: gigglebugmama

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Sit Flat
customer_reviews.text: Good quality products used, cheaply made. The rack does not sit flat how it’s expected to, kind of bent but does serve its purpose. The price paid for the item was a little overboard for the make of the product but it takes more effort to return it and I needed the item.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love this for parties and organizing fridge
customer_reviews.text: We always have parties at the house and our fridge is always full of beer. This not only helps keep everything organized, it also makes it easier to get beer out of the fridge. You do have to be carful while filling; when the beer rolls down it gains speed and can make the first beer bounce out if your not careful!
customer_reviews.author: CamrynMcLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and use. Made our fridge more organized and functional. I’d recommend if you have cans often. Would work well for soups too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This Fifo rack is great, it was easy to put together, it stacks very easily and it is quite sturdy. Unfortunately it didn't fit on my walmart bookcase that I use as a pantry, but that is on me. It fit right beside it. Just what I have been looking for and it is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyhaze

customer_reviews.title: These are it, don't waste time searching for others
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted something cheaper or even just a single one and not two. But eventually after searching around I gave into the reviews and bought this. They we right! These are study, quality, and perfect for my girlfriend and I who love having cold La Croix on hand in the refrigerator. No more awkward boxes to try and dig around in.
customer_reviews.author: William McKenzie III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: As I pulled this out of the packaging I thought it would never work or be sturdy enough. But once you have it all together it works perfectly and is sturdy as heck for my sodas! I love the way it looks and it takes up no more room than a 12 pack box of soda does but looks a million times better. Love it and glad I have 2 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Utchell

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ridiculous assembly required. The pieces look the same and aren’t labeled to make it clear what is what. It’s like playing the visual attention game where you have to find 10 differences between two pictures that look the same. Not worth the hassle. I should have just bought a plastic thing at target.
customer_reviews.author: dljohnson

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased beverage can dispensers in the past (mostly plastic) and needless to say, they wear out quickly, crack or just break apart. Decided to upgrade and am happy I did. This dispenser will definitely last a long, long time. It is extremely easy to put together, fits perfect in the refrigerator (without stacking) and looks good. The item arrived ahead of schedule, cost was extremely reasonable and would highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: R Harris

customer_reviews.title: Lose their sturdiness when stacked
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful as individuals but a little wobbly when you stack them. I give a 4/5 stars because they are sturdy on their own and are easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha L

customer_reviews.title: Can’t overfill
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and they do stack. Unfortunately, it was too tall for our cabinets to use them stacked. And you absolutely cannot over fill these, the first can will pop right out. Otherwise we are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes counter storage of soda much more aesthetic and pleasing to my soul. :)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Might require a little bit of elbow grease to get some of the pieces to link together but it's not hard. Stackable so takes up less space than leaving cases of soda open. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: This product works great to keep soda or small cans organized and easy to access, in frig or shelves. It was easy to assemble, just follow the pictured instruction. It's also very solid and sturdy, holding a fair amount of weight in canned products. You won't regret purchasing this can holder/dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Assembly, but Convenient Product
customer_reviews.text: These coke can holders are sturdy and do the job I expected them to do. The only thing is that the assembly took some time and interpretation to figure out since the instructions (surprise, surprise) were vague with only 2 or 3 diagrams and directional arrows for assembly. Once I figured out the first one, the second one was easy enough. Even with the slight hassle and inconvenience of poor assembly instructions, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rehn

customer_reviews.title: Was only able to assemble one of the two
customer_reviews.text: One of the two assembled fairly easily, but a piece of the other was made incorrectly, to where no matter what I tried, the pegs would not line up to go where they were supposed to to be secure. Having to order and wait for a replacement set from Amazon, and won't be returning the one good one I do have until I ensure the replacement set isn't also defective.
customer_reviews.author: Cherron

customer_reviews.title: Great! Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I only used one in the fridge and the other for soup can in the cupboard. Both fit perfectly. I think people are confused when putting them together. Make sure you are looking at all the pieces before assuming they sent you the wrong one. Mine fit together perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This storage device is almost perfect. It is great for holding 12 cans of soda in the fridge. I like the way I can feed the cans from the top, and they load up fifo. The bad thing is that the cans don't continue to move forward if only 5, or less, cans, are in the device. They actually start rolling backwards. Would be nice if they moved forwards no matter how many cans are in there.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mangette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and provides optimal organization.
customer_reviews.text: The stackable beverage container is wonderful. It took me less than 5 minutes to assemble and add our cans to. It is easy to see when I am low on product versus seeing a box and having to reach in to figure out how much is left. Also, the container has just the right grade so when you drop a can in it easily rolls to the next open space. My children love putting the cans in after we grocery shop, and I feel more organized!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Brown

customer_reviews.title: great products
customer_reviews.text: larger than I anticipated but love how it dispenses the soda. You can actually get 13 cans in them. Once just sits high in the back but works perfectly in the fridge. Keeps the fridge way more organized
customer_reviews.author: Arika Capo-chichi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all of the pieces are correct!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, except that they sent me a wrong piece so that it doesn’t completely go together correctly and isn’t as sturdy. You put the rack together by putting pieces in holes. But the holes are like left and right, and then sent 2 lefts for one of the racks. I’ll figure something out with a zip tie, but I would have expected better, frankly. Otherwise, it has great capacity and I’d like it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 sets for pantry can storage. What a space saver. Hesitated after seeing bad pics but whoever put them together put the side panels on the wrong side. All six of mine are fine and fully stocked with can foods.
customer_reviews.author: MarieP.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy strong easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful!! Strong sturdy and so easy to assemble! My refrigerator drawers were breaking from the constant use to get colas. I bought these for fast easy access to sodas. They have been just wonderful for that. Fits in my top shelf. We love them! You will too!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly on my counter and under the cabinets! I have them stacked and doesn't take up too much space and keeps 2 cases of soda hand neat and at hand when the fridge needs to be replenished
customer_reviews.author: silly monkey mommy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work...
customer_reviews.text: First would not go together because 2 of the peg holders were on the wrong side.. had to leave one of the pegs free which made it unsturdy on top shelf..2nd a beer can would not roll in it....very unsatisfied with this purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I wanted to create a "beverage center" on one shelf in my fridge. This works perfectly for canned drinks, then I added a tray to hold the small plastic bottles of juice which leaves room for two rows of long neck bottles. So much more organized!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Dent

customer_reviews.title: Solid Soda Rack System
customer_reviews.text: So, I wasn't able to assemble without looking at instructions, but once I gave in and read them, assembly was easy. These have been designed with thought and care and I can't see why this wouldn't be a one-time purchase that we take with us every time we move. I bought two sets (so four racks) and I can stack all four together to maximize storage between my fridge and oven. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LaurDan

customer_reviews.title: Good enough - not great
customer_reviews.text: It holds the cans, but it a bit finicky in getting all of the connections together. This can cause it to come loose and the slope of the can rails is not maintained. But overall it works fine and it is in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Storage System
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely perfect solution to my Coke storage problem. I had had the plastic version of this storage system before and it broke easily. This is extremely sturdy, and I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Mull

customer_reviews.title: Was to tall for refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: The pop holder was to tall would not fit in the refrigerator, our new refrigerator doesn’t have adjustable shelves it’s a side by side so it didn’t fit. Also the sides of the pop holder had the thin metal strips that where broken so I had to super glue them back. We might use it in the pantry for cam goods tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very space friendly option
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to help organize the new fridge. They are as advertised. We have them on the lip of the shelf to create a better angle for refilling, the could use a little more slope to allow the cans to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a couple of months, I thought they would be good to organize my fridge and pantry. I've had several cans roll off the racks and bust open and had a few that got punctured just from refilling the rack, also have a problem with cans getting stuck on the back part of the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sturdy, bent a little bit on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars, however, they were a bit bent on arrival. I was able to bend them can into shape pretty well, though they still sit at a sight tilt rather than flat on the floor. They seem very sturdy, and I'd think as long as you don't put side to side pressure you could easily stack 4 on top of one another. I'll be ordering more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for space saving
customer_reviews.text: Love these racks! Saves so much room in my fridge. I like that they can stack or you can leave them next to each other. It’s also aesthetically pleasing when it’s full of drinks if you’re one of those people like me LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ya Soda water! It tickles ya innerts 🤣
customer_reviews.text: My wife drinks a lot of flavored soda water. We needed a rack to hold all the cans and keep the kitchen more organized. Shipped fast and SHE Loves Them!
customer_reviews.author: Duskydog26

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to organizing soda cans.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these stacked on each other and it works great. Sturdy and strong, and oh so nice to be organized now. Instead of a bunch of 12 packs some opened some not, I have them readily available to grab one to replace the one being taken out of the refrigerator. I've had it fully loaded since May, still strong and stable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cans roll out nicely
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use storage and dispensing. The assembly was average, meaning it was not difficult to put together. Although with a few tweaks the assembly could be even smoother. No tools were required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had one more clip
customer_reviews.text: Each 2 pack includes 2 clips so you can stack and clip them together. However, if you want to stack 4 of them there aren’t enough clips to combine the 2 packs. Otherwise, great item.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jarasius

customer_reviews.title: They cannot be stacked up more than three even if you buy two sets..
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give a five-star review on this product as I first see the product because it looked sturdy and the finish was fairly good. However, after I assemble one module I realized that they only give one set of connecting parts which makes it impossible to stake up only two modules. So I was only able to stack them up with three modules although my intention was to use all four as one body. They should have added more connecting parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fridge or pantry usage
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these. I use them in the fridge and in the pantry for can storage. These are sturdy, easy to put together, and stackable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are working out great for us. Our company purchases soda for the office which are put into a standard refrigerator. These racks work wonderfully for our purpose. The soda is organized so much better, they are super easy to keep loaded and best of all, the next soda to pull is nice and cold. These are sturdy racks. Don't hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SharonGN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Does exactly what you need it to.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful. I always have cans of something in the fridge. They stack easily and don't fall apart. It makes it really easy to grab a drink or whatever you need. I love that it loads from the top and front. Really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, it hold a dozen cans and the fact that it move the cans down after you pull one, is amazing. Sturdiness is good, I did put it in the fridge so I had to put a pice or cardboard under, but I love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Ramirez-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to store soda cans in my basement refrigerator. Easy to put together and very sturdy. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gullo

customer_reviews.title: Soda lovers will want this
customer_reviews.text: We drink soda every single day. An ungodly/unhealthy amount, so we needed something to make it easier to grab a soda. Not only does it drop down the sodas nicely, but it also shows us how much we have left instead of leaving them in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lukey

customer_reviews.title: It is a space saver, and it is highly functional
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, feels sturdy. It doesn't fall apart or wobble. It comes with two so its more than a good value. Additionally they stack, but if your fridge is that tall then you are living the good life :). Solid product, good instructions, quality all around I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Ray COmm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Finally storage and free space!
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and pretty easy to assemble. I do have some extra little black pieces. Dark brownish bronze not bronze but it works really well as I bought 2 for my parents pop obsession! I plan to buy more for our soup cabinet! Great items for the price and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Teal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this dispenser. It looks nice in my fridge and keeps pop cans from getting shoved to the back. It was incredibly easy to assemble and it's even pretty. If I had a need for something like this on my counter top, I would absolutely order more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lascari

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these 3 times as well as other Bextware products. All are designed well, sturdy, easy to assemble and a good value. I'm not done filling my pantry and will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: GreenMatter

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It assembles rather easily. But once assembled one of the two racks was slightly bent and didn't sit flat. I tried tweaking it, which helped a little bit. But, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Now I own two
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and it magically organized the floor area of my tiny pantry. Immediately purchased a second one and now I actually have unused space on the floor of my tiny pantry. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: We have a beverage fridge in the garage and keep several kinds of cans of soda - this rack system makes it tidier, easy to load and pull out . Makes refrigerator less messy and can see at a glance how much of a product is left. Probably going to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for storing our soda and sparkling water without having torn-up boxes littering the kitchen. Love the minimalist look, and they are very sturdy even when stacked. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Can holder was a little too tall for my liking. It took up a lot of space which I didn't like in regards to having to raise the Shelf higher then expected.. I think a half inch shorter would have worked great
customer_reviews.author: DunkelRabe

customer_reviews.title: Saves space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to see if it would successfully fit on my rack and still work evenly. I needed to put a piece of cardboard under it so the four legs would have something to stand upon. My rack has wire shelves. The dispenser does work to dispense corn and green bean cans,. It should work for most cans. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Dispenses easily
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I wanted to stack 2 together which is easy to do. However they make a tall set, which I should have expected but didn't, so they do not fit on the top shelf of my fridge. So they have to sit side by side, which does not save as much space as I had hoped. Also, I had to put cardboard under them so they did not "fall" thru the wired fridge shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only way to store a lot of cans in a refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: I set up both of these can dispensers in my refrigerator to hold two different canned beverages. Each one will hold a dozen cans and of course feeds another to the front when you take one out.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these. 2 had broken welds when they arrived and were unusable. 1 had excess solder or paint in one of the assembly holes so it could not be put together. The 4th one worked. The best thing about these is that Amazon didn't waste any time refunding me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and organizing
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great for space saving! Very Organizing! Looks great in my pantry. I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: R.S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, saves fridge space
customer_reviews.text: We had a plastic can dispenser in our refrigerator for years, but needed a new one. This one was easy to assemble and works well. It came in a package of two, so our son immediately asked for the extra one. We're all happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katje

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR IN THE FRIDGE
customer_reviews.text: WE GOT THE TWO PACK ON FOR BEER ONE FOR SODA AND ITS GREAT KNOW WHAT IS ALLWAYS THE COLDEST
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Tafuna

customer_reviews.title: The racks were easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The racks were easy to assemble, but they are too long to fit in a 17 cu ft refrigerator. Had to turn the side ways on top of the vegetable bins as they could not position on the middle wire rack. Have ended up using them in my pantry for extra cans, which has freed up room from beverage boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, works great with canned soups, veggies and other canned food. Would like to find ones that fits other bigger canned foods.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I cook too much to use two in my fridge. One works just fine for me. They are big enough if you mix up your soda you can pull one out the side with no problems. All in all I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing my diet coke.
customer_reviews.text: I keep diet coke in my frig all the time and this works perfect for keeping them neat and in one place . and you always know if you are running low.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Ex lent product and very easy to assemble. 3 minutes and I was done. I filled it with soda and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good product & customer service too!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for soda cans, but found it works for other cans too! We ended up buying several more for can tomato sauces, beans etc. for our pantry and they are working out great. One of the racks were broken and customer service was great and another one is shipped and on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Nabors

customer_reviews.title: Space saving
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!! curved piece at bottom of ramp is not high enough to hold can back... sometimes while loading, cans rolling down the ramp will push the first can out... Space saving and easier to get a soda then a soda box... have already bought another set..
customer_reviews.author: lori moss

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pantry neat & spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, size, and ease of these. They fit perfectly into my tiny pantry. As you can see from the photos, the legs all fit JUST onto my shelf, while the lip part hangs over. I am using them to store canned goods, but the larger sized soup and fruit cans won't fit in the roll down capacity. This is okay, however, since I can just put them at the top of the racks.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Work great, serves its purpose! :)
customer_reviews.text: I liked these racks a lot, serves the purpose intended for them. Helps me preserve space for all those cans! 😊
customer_reviews.author: vvnrox87

product_meta.title: 2 Pack - Stackable Beverage Soda Can Dispenser Organizer Rack, Bronze
feature_bullets: Beverage Can Dispenser Rack holds 12 standard size 12 oz soda cans and small size food cans.
Stackable & Slim Design that saves your space. Easy Assembly. No tools required.
Organize your cans and place them in your refrigerator, kitchen and cabinets.
Sturdy metal construction with Classic Bronze Coating; Dimension: 17.5"L x 5.8"W x 8.5"H (each)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,103 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
